properties.name: Bishop Spencer Place IL/AL/SNF
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid4301 Madison Ave Kansas City, MO 64111Life is full of new beginnings. And choosing where to live in retirement is one of them. At Bishop Spencer Place, you’ll thrive, energized by the cultural activities and conveniences Kansas City has to offer, just minutes from your front door. You can also relax, knowing you’ve chosen a lovely, vibrant community that’s expanding to include spacious apartments and new amenities. Plus, as a Continuing Care Retirement Community, we offer all levels of care, from total independence to Coventry Count assisted living to York Place health center for those who require a higher degree of skilled nursing care. Bishop Spencer Place is closely affiliated with the Episcopal Diocese of West Missouri and is privileged to be part of the Saint Luke’s Hospital network of providers. Opportunity. Independence. Friendships. Health. Life is full of new beginnings…and choices. Make yours Bishop Spencer Place.

properties.name: Carnegie Village IL
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid107 Bernard Drive Belton, MO 64012Welcome to Carnegie Village, adult and retirement living at its finest. This fully gated community provides maintenance and worry free living for seniors age 55 and older. Our community is designed for you to maintain your independent lifestyle and be as active or as quiet as you like, with the knowledge that you are in the care of a staff that is fully devoted to your comfort. Carnegie Village is a beautiful brick building overlooking Belton Memorial Park and the surrounding community. It is built of the highest quality and staffed with experienced people. All the services you need are available on the premises. This self contained community is truly adult and retirement living at its finest. Located within ½ mile in the heart of Belton’s fastest growing area you will find local businesses such as: Target Home Depot HyVee Grocery Store Kohl’s Dept Store Belton Theater Post Office Ruby Tuesdays Longhorn Steakhouse Jose Peppers Bob Evan’s Restaurant Eckerd Drug Store Walgreens Drug Store If you would like to take in some of the local attractions, Belton is located only minutes from the finest social and recreational facilities that Kansas City has to offer. These include: The Kansas City Royals Baseball Club The Kansas City Chiefs Football Team The symphony The ballet Several theatres Variety of river boats The renowned Plaza Hallmark’s Crown Center Bartle Hall Kemper Arena Here at Carnegie Village in Belton, you can enjoy the charm of a small town and have all the amenities of the big city only minutes away.

properties.name: Villa Ventura IL
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid12100 Wornall Rd, Kansas City, MOVilla Ventura is an inviting community with beautifully landscaped grounds that are an outward expression of the caring you’ll find inside. Our individual residences are attractive and bright – waiting for you to add your personal touches with your own cherished belongings. Villa Ventura’s community living areas and dining rooms welcome you to share stories and make new friends. And because everything is meticulously maintained – with housekeeping and linen service provided, you never have to worry about repairs, cleaning or yard work. Independent Living: There is a big difference between living independently – and feeling isolated. Being part of a vibrant community with on-site security and a variety of helpful services is the answer. Emergency call systems in each personal residence put our 24-hour staff at your service. Villa Ventura’s genuinely caring staff is here for you, with the services and amenities you need to feel comfortable. * Beautiful, spacious apartments * Studio, One or Two Bedrooms available * Assisted Living center * Life enrichment programs * Activities, classes and outings coordinated by Full-time Activities Director * Weekly housekeeping and ﬂat linen service * 24-hour staff * Private dining room * Continuous dining 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM * Multipurpose room with big screen TV and movie library * Community areas include; pub, ice cream parlor, billiards and arts and crafts room * Interior and exterior maintenance provided * Ample parking * Complimentary laundry facilities * On-site banking services * Scenic walking trail * Exercise room * Computer Center * Wellness clinic * Pets welcome * Beautiful non-denominational chapel * General store * Shuttle services provided for medical, entertainment and personal needs * Minutes from the Plaza Additional Services & Information * Beauty and Barber Shop located in the community * Additional apartment cleaning and personal laundry service * Personal shopping service * Guest apartment * Guest meals * Personal care services Assisted Living: Conveniently located within Villa Ventura is our own Assisted Living community where residents enjoy life with their friends and neighbors while receiving the support and assistance they need to remain independent. A Registered Nurse meets with each resident and their family to identify the resident’s needs and accommodate their preferred routine. This enables all of our residents to remain active and engaged in life. Services include: Level I * Staff on duty 24-hours a day * Weekly housekeeping, ﬂat linen service, and personal laundry * Daily assistance with medication management * Stand-by bathing assistance * Supervision of dressing and grooming * Three delicious and healthy meals daily * Stimulating activities and social events * Scheduled transportation * Interior and exterior maintenance provided * Independent heating and cooling controls Level II All Level I services plus: * Monitoring of mealtime needs such as cutting meats, completing menu * Direct personal assistance with bathing, grooming and dressing * Daytime, evening and nighttime checks of resident’s condition and whereabouts * Other monitoring and assisting services as determined by management Level III All Level II services plus: * Management of chronic urinary incontinence (including additional laundry or bathing as needed) * Other monitoring and assisting services as determined by management Additional Services and Information * Beauty and Barber Shop located in the community * Additional apartment cleaning and personal laundry service * Personal shopping service * Guest apartment Aging in Place: Villa Ventura’s Aging-in-Place Philosophy reflects our dedication to your comfort and wellbeing. Simply put, it enables you to receive the support services you need should your health circumstances change. We’re here for you, in a way that lets you remain part of your community longer. Our Aging-in-Place philosophy resonates throughout the Senior Star Living® experience: * On-going, non-medical support services that reduce physical stress and risk for injury * Round-the-clock staff available * Emergency call systems in personal residences * Discreet, integrated systems that enable staff to be alert for signs that extra care or support is needed Personal Care Program: Personal Care Program You know your changing needs better than anyone. That’s why our residents can contract individual, supportive services that maximize one’s abilities and promote health and safety – all in an environment that encourages independence. Initial assessments and supervision are provided by a Registered Nurse. With a variety of services available, we make it easy to customize the level and combination of Personal Assistance allowing you to remain as independent as possible.
